thread.section_title: Broadway at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel.
thread.title_full: Great hotel. - Review of Broadway at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nataile h
title: Great hotel.
text:
Although we didn't really get a good view of NYC from this hotel, it was ideal from what we wanted for the holiday. We were pleased to see that the location of the hotel is very close to times sq and within walking distance to Central Park & Rockefeller and Empire State. We barely had to get transport!
Great location with some good restaurants around & the breakfast was ideal for something quick! The room was lovely and equipped with everything we needed, although we wasn't in the room much!
Definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking to do the tourist bits of NYC as it is very close to everything!
